vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Νικόπολις, -εως, ἡ
Nicopolis, prob. the city of that name in Epirus (CGT, in l): Tit.3:12†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Nicopolis, "victory city"
Nicopolis, a city of Macedonia, Tit. 3:12*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
尼哥波立 这个專有地名在原文的意思是 "勝利之城"
不少城市以此為名 (多 3:12,15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
尼哥波立 这个专有地名在原文的意思是 "胜利之城"
不少城市以此为名 (多 3:12,15)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ni-cô-bô-li; Ni-cô-pô-li: một thành. Xem G3534 và G4172.
